name: Physics Galaxy
description: Physics Galaxy is dedicated to offer most refined academic content in the subject of physics up to high school level, which is powered to develop required expertise to crack competitive examinations like IIT-JEE, BITSAT, AIPMT, AIIMS, International Physics Olympiad, KVPY & NTSE.  Ashish Arora, the brain behind this interactive unique system of Physics Galaxy, has his 7000+ basic theory lectures available on web for FREE OF COST for online viewing. His youtube channel Physics Galaxy is Worlds Largest Encyclopedia of FREE Online Physics Lectures. More than 25000 video lectures are being watched per day on this channel which is highest among any other e-learning website/channel in India on Physics. Till now more than 18 Million videos are watched on it. On each video subtitles are also available in 67 languages using google translator including English, Hindi, Chinese, French, Marathi, Bangla, Urdu and other regional and international languages.  All the free content on the website www.physicsgalaxy.com can be accessed through this Physics Galaxy App.
